column5: If anyone is interested Clear Lake just south of Stoney Lake is starting to open up and there's a few spots of soft water visible.
Just itchin to get out there too I bet..
Just itchin to get out there too I bet..  It's funny, but the water is only 200' from my front door but I haven't fished Clear in probably 15 years.
they know you are close Lew!  they hear you coming.
they hear you coming.  Maybe that's why I never had much luck on Clear LOL
If anyone is interested Clear Lake just south of Stoney Lake is starting to open up and there's a few spots of soft water visible. Best spring news I have heard all year.......thanks for posting.
Brother, your news just made my day!
Don't get too excited Garry, it'll still be quite awhile before water skiing season LOL
Brother, your news just made my day! You might just get lucky this spring Garry

Don't get too excited Garry, it'll still be quite awhile before water skiing season LOL YA,  I just received my yearly supply from Cabela's of underwater torpedo's for them pesty skiers and water bikes / jet skies. I hope I don't run out like last year.....so I added another hundy to the order.
